subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Tammy Thomas, a former Olympic cyclist charged with lying to a federal grand jury about performance-enhancing drug use, accused federal prosecutors of foul play by including “unnecessarily graphic details” of her medical records. She has asked a judge to throw out the case. Prosecutors included information on beard growth and voice changes in court filings last week. Thomas said those descriptions were meant to taint the jury pool.
